footer.tagline: Build professional, ATS-friendly resumes with AI-powered suggestions. Your dream career starts here.

about.title: About 123Resume
about.subtitle: Empowering job seekers to create professional resumes that get noticed
about.missionText: At 123Resume, we believe that everyone deserves a resume that showcases their true potential. Our mission is to make professional resume creation accessible, easy, and effective for job seekers at all stages of their careers. We combine cutting-edge AI technology with proven resume best practices to help you stand out in today's competitive job market.
about.aiSuggestionsDesc: Get intelligent recommendations to improve your resume's impact and ATS compatibility.
about.professionalTemplatesDesc: Choose from multiple professionally designed templates that suit your industry and style.
about.atsOptimizedDesc: Ensure your resume passes Applicant Tracking Systems and reaches human recruiters.
about.userFriendlyDesc: Create your resume in minutes with our intuitive, step-by-step builder.
about.freeToUse: Free to use with no hidden costs
about.saveAndEdit: Save and edit your resumes anytime
about.exportToPdf: Export to PDF ready for applications

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.emailUsDesc: For general inquiries, support, or feedback
contact.supportDesc: Need help with your resume? We're here to assist.
contact.howToCreate: How do I create a resume?
contact.howToCreateAnswer: Simply click "Start Building Free" and follow our step-by-step guide. It takes just a few minutes!
contact.isFreeAnswer: Yes! Our basic resume builder is completely free. You can create, edit, and download your resume at no cost.
contact.multipleResumesAnswer: Absolutely! You can create and save as many resumes as you need. Perfect for tailoring resumes to different job applications.
contact.howToDownload: How do I download my resume?
contact.howToDownloadAnswer: Once you've created your resume, you can download it as a PDF directly from the resume view page.
contact.businessInquiries: For business inquiries or partnerships, please email us at

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: At 123Resume ("we", "our", or "us"), we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our resume builder service.
privacy.section2Text: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
privacy.section2Item2: Resume content and data you enter into our platform
privacy.section2Item4: Communication data when you contact us
privacy.section3Text: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.section3Item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
privacy.section3Item2: Process your resume creation and storage requests
privacy.section3Item4: Respond to your inquiries and provide support
privacy.section3Item5: Detect and prevent fraud or abuse
privacy.section4Text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.section5Item4: Object to processing of your data
privacy.section6Text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Text: By accessing and using 123Resume, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.
terms.section2Text: Permission is granted to use 123Resume for personal, non-commercial purposes. This license allows you to:
terms.section2Item1: Create and edit resumes for your personal use
terms.section2Item2: Download your resumes as PDF files
terms.section2NotPermitItem2: Using our service for commercial purposes without authorization
terms.section2NotPermitItem3: Reverse engineering or copying our code
terms.section3Text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
terms.section4Text: You retain all rights to the content you create using 123Resume. You are solely responsible for the accuracy and legality of the information you include in your resumes. We do not claim ownership of your content.
terms.section5Text: We strive to provide reliable service but do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the service at any time.
terms.section6Text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, 123Resume shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.
terms.section7Text: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.section1Text: The data controller responsible for processing your personal data is 123Resume. For any data protection inquiries, please contact us at
dataProtection.section2Text: We process your personal data based on:
dataProtection.section2Item1: Your consent when you create an account
dataProtection.section2Item2: Contractual necessity to provide our services
dataProtection.section2Item3: Legitimate interests in improving our service
dataProtection.section3Text: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in our Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal data within 30 days.
dataProtection.section4Text: Your data is stored securely on servers located within the European Union. We do not transfer your personal data to countries outside the EU/EEA without appropriate safeguards in place.
dataProtection.section5Text: As a data subject, you have the following rights:
dataProtection.section5Item1: Right of access: Request a copy of your personal data
dataProtection.section5Item2: Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
dataProtection.section5Item3: Right to erasure: Request deletion of your data
dataProtection.section5Item4: Right to restrict processing: Limit how we use your data
dataProtection.section5Item5: Right to data portability: Receive your data in a structured format
dataProtection.section5Item6: Right to object: Object to processing of your data
dataProtection.section5Item7: Right to withdraw consent: Withdraw consent at any time
dataProtection.section6Text: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure authentication, regular security audits, and access controls to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
dataProtection.section7Text: To exercise your rights or for any data protection concerns, please contact us at

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.section1Text: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our service.
cookies.essentialText: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.
cookies.functionalText: These cookies allow us to remember your preferences and provide enhanced, personalized features. For example, they remember your login status and language preferences.
cookies.analyticsText: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve our service.
cookies.section3Text: You can control and manage cookies in several ways. Please keep in mind that removing or blocking cookies can impact your user experience and parts of our website may no longer be fully accessible.
cookies.section3Item1: Your browser settings (most browsers allow you to refuse or accept cookies)
cookies.section3Item2: Our cookie consent banner when you first visit our site
cookies.section3Item3: Third-party opt-out tools for specific cookie types
cookies.section4Text: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We do not control these cookies, and you should check the third-party websites for more information about their cookie practices.
cookies.section5Text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please revisit this page periodically to stay informed about our use of cookies.
cookies.section6Text: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at
